reviews.review: It's like the best game i have ever seen
Ottimo gioco per chi vuole impegnarsi a giocare, io l'ho scaricato da un mese ormai, e mi sta appassionando molto
simplesmente o melhor jogo da steam!
Best FPS game in my life.

Game - Cheaters = best

Good game if u decide to play on faceIt or other clients and not MM
I hate and love this game
Good game but need improvement in VAC.
CSGO va mourir si gaben ne fait rien contre les hackeurs, les serveurs 64 tick et avec le hitreg qui marchent a 80%. A ne pas acheter, ni a perdre votre temps et votre argent.
I don't think I could name a worse game

Counter-Strike is a fickle beast, but here's the long and the short of it:

This isn't a game where your character gets better. This is a game where YOU get better.

For the competitive at heart and the tactical in nature, CSGO is simply unmatched.

What can I say about CS:GO that hasn't been said?  Best competitive FPS ever created.
reminds me of shrek 7: the game.
I played this game for hours and hours, this game is wonderful
Valve, it's time to stop being ridiculous and end the cheaters urgently. Are all the money invested by users going to the site?

don't get fool by 119 hours of gameplay, i never play competitive.. why? my friends never want to do it.. i'm buying this game for fun offline match and for skins.. just that.. yes i'm a filthy casual..

this game came out in 2012 and still has over 12 million monthly players

I've quit this game three times and I keep coming back

great game, would always recommend

p.s. valve pls give me my rank back

Worst game you will ever own. Community is: Abusive, Mean, Anti-social, will kick you from games and ban you from playing the game you paid for. Do Not buy this game, it is a waste of $20.
Dieses Spiel ist sehr schwer und es gibt viele hacker, aber mit guten Freunden und viel Ehrgeiz ist es ein Nerven aufreibendes und witziges Spiel.
